name: Clever Leaves Holdings Inc.
description: Clever Leaves Holdings Inc. is a leading international operator and licensed producer of pharmaceutical-grade cannabis and hemp-derived products. Founded in 2018, the company is committed to advancing the global cannabis industry by providing high-quality products while adhering to stringent regulatory standards. With its headquarters in Colombia and operations across multiple countries, Clever Leaves harnesses the advantages of its cultivation facilities to produce a diverse range of cannabis extracts and products for medicinal purposes. The company focuses on sustainable and efficient agricultural practices, utilizing advanced technologies to optimize crop yield and quality. Clever Leaves is strategically positioned to meet the growing demand for cannabis-based therapies, partnering with various healthcare providers to deliver innovative solutions to patients. Its product offerings include cannabinoid extracts, oils, and other formulations, catering to both domestic and international markets. Through ongoing research and development, Clever Leaves aims to expand its product portfolio and enhance its competitive edge in the rapidly evolving cannabis sector. The company is dedicated to compliance, sustainability, and the well-being of its stakeholders, aiming to be a trusted name in the cannabis industry.

seo.meta_title: Clever Leaves Holdings Inc. | Global Leader in Cannabis Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Clever Leaves Holdings, a leading international producer of cannabis and hemp-derived pharmaceutical products, dedicated to quality, sustainability, and innovation.

faq.question: What does Clever Leaves specialize in?
faq.answer: Clever Leaves specializes in the production of pharmaceutical-grade cannabis and hemp-derived products.

faq.question: Where is Clever Leaves headquartered?
faq.answer: Clever Leaves is headquartered in Bogotá, Colombia.

faq.question: What types of products does Clever Leaves offer?
faq.answer: Clever Leaves offers cannabinoid extracts, oils, and topical formulations.
